column2: Special Note About Children   This site is not intended for children. Children may use this site only with the direct supervision of their parent or legal guardian. We do not attempt to collect any data or personal information from children. Any parents or guardians who are aware of children submitting information should notify us at once of the specific information so that we may remove them from any mailing lists. All recipients of any online promotions must be 21 years of age or older. Age is verified upon contact of the specified winner.
